CWEs: CWE-601: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
description: The function 'unique_name_75' is vulnerable due to several reasons. Firstly, it does not validate the 'request.url' properly which can lead to Insecure Direct Object References (IDOR) vulnerability. Secondly, it changes the URL from 'file://' to 'http://' without any validation, which can lead to Open Redirect Vulnerability. Lastly, it logs the 'request.url' which can lead to sensitive information disclosure through server logs.
